resources.string: App is working. Listen some music to get ratings.
It was %d day(s) since last update
Check your Internet. You need it to download data.

This is unofficial app that shows how theneedledrop rated album you\'re currently listening. Ratings are pulled from Google Spreadsheets document. \n\nAll links are in dialog \"Open Source Licenses and Links\".
Allow working in background so you can get ratings in notification when app is not launched
